content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron Smelting Setup at y=0
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0, 0) - Currently working, processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone furnace at position (4, 0) - Currently working, processing iron ore into iron plates
Both furnaces are fueled with coal and contain iron ore for processing.

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to place entities without having them in inventory
- Before attempting to place entities (like burner mining drills), ensure you have crafted or obtained the required entity first
- Check inventory contents before placement attempts to avoid placement failures

### Errors when trying to craft items requiring sub-ingredients
- When crafting complex items like burner mining drills, ensure all sub-ingredients are either in inventory or can be crafted directly
- For items requiring smelted materials (like iron plates), these must be obtained from furnaces rather than trying to craft them directly
- Plan the crafting sequence to first obtain base materials before attempting to craft more complex items
